title: The Latest and Greatest Near Death Experience (NDE) So Far?
post:
Muy interesante el relato del Dr. Eben Alexander.
Los mejores trabajos sobre las NDE son los del cardiólogo Dr. Pim van Lommel:
http://www.pimvanlommel.nl/?Endless_consciousness
En 2001, la más prestigiosa revista médica, “The Lancet” publicaba:
“Near-death experience in survivors of cardiac arrest: a prospective study in the Netherlands “. Pim van Lommel, Ruud van Wees, Vincent Meyers, Ingrid Elfferich
http://www.pimvanlommel.nl/files/publicaties/Lancet%20artikel%20Pim%20van%20Lommel.pdf

title: The Latest and Greatest Near Death Experience (NDE) So Far?
post:
Inscribed on the “Buland Darwaza” gate of the Jama Masjid Mosque in Fatehpur Sikri, India, both built by the Moghul Emperor Akbar in AD 1601:
“Jesus said, The world is a bridge; cross this bridge and do not build upon it.”
So we must wait and see if the author of the book really finished crossing the bridge and came back to tell the story or much of it has to do with the words “build upon it” mixed with a badly interpreted experience. It is the best scientists in the field who will be able to answer the question.
author: Louis
